thread.title: ‘White’ to be a musical movie: Rahul Raj
thread.title_full: ‘White’ to be a musical movie: Rahul Raj - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: ‘White’ to be a musical movie: Rahul Raj
text:
Music composer Rahul Raj who is busy composing songs for Uday Ananthan's upcoming cinema 'White' says that the film will have music although.
"I am really excited to work for it. Hoping to bring out some good numbers," he adds. 'White' tells the story of two strangers meeting at a foreign place cast Mammootty and Huma Qureshi. Mammootty will be seen as a billionaire, who falls in love with a 25-year-old girl Roshni Menon, acted by Huma.
